name: SwynthWave
description:
Swing your way to the top!

Controls:

LEFT CLICK to shoot a grappling hook

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

hold LEFT SHIFT while in the air to boost forward (uses fuel guage)

FUEL refuels only when you're on the ground

P to pause music

Keep in mind:

-Blue Lined platforms cannot be grappled to

- Pink platforms cannot be jumped off

Having trouble? Watch me beat the game here:
